title.rendered: Star Sports bags the media rights of Cricket Australia for 4 years

content.rendered: Star Sports bagged the media rights of Cricket Australia (CA) for upcoming 4 years. The announcement has been done by CA Board in the end of last July month. As per report, the deal commences in 2023-24. Disney star will have to broadcast the Australia’s cricket matches in India and part of Asia.
